resources.string: As I mentioned before, the action has an id and we can see from the code snippets above that in the navController.navigate call we pass that id. That is how the navigation takes into account all the attributes specified, such as transitions and arguments. Just for the sake of trying, we can replace R.id.openNotificationDetailsAction with R.id.notificationDetails. The navigation will still be able to open the details fragment because in the navigation graph that fragment is defined with R.id.notificationDetails id. However, there will be no transition.
